attributes.action: Allow Catholic Adoption Agencies to be exempt from proposed new legistation giving Gay/Lesbian couples the right to adoption
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details:
There are already lots of petitions on this topic:
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=adopt
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
